ARABIC: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلرَّجْفَةُ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ فِى دَارِهِمْ جَٰثِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But they denied him so the earthquake seized them and morning found them lying flattened in their homes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they denied him and were seized by an earthquake, and lay overturned in their homes in the morning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But they denounced him as a liar. So a mighty earthquake overtook them, and by the morning they lay overturned in their houses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They rejected him so We jolted them with a violent earthquake and they were left motionless in their houses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In response they denied him – thereupon the earthquake seized them – so at morning they remained lying flattened in their homes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they denied him; so the earthquake seized them, and they lay, prostrate in their dwellings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But they rejected him, so a severe earthquake overtook them, and they became motionless bodies in their abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But they cried lies to him; so the earthquake seized them, and morning found them in their habitation fallen prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But they denied him, and the dreadful earthquake took them, and morning found them prostrate in their dwelling place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But they rejected him, so the earthquake overwhelmed them and they were left lying prostrate on the ground in their homes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they belied him; wherefore an earthquake laid hold of them, and they lay in their dwellings, crouching.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But they impugned him, whereupon the earthquake seized them, and they lay lifeless prostrate in their homes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But they rejected him: Then the mighty Blast seized them, and they lay prostrate in their homes by the morning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they belied him [Shu'aib (Shuaib)], so the earthquake seized them, and they lay (dead), prostrate in their dwellings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But they belied him, so the earthquake seized them, and when morning came, they were found fallen crouched in their dwellings, dead.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But they rejected him, so the tremor overtook them, and they were left motionless in their homes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But they denied him, so the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home [corpses] fallen prone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:37]   But they denied him, and so the earthquake, the violent tremor, seized them, and they ended up lying lifeless prostrate in their habitations, keeled over their knees, dead.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But they denied him) they rejected his message, (and the dreadful earthquake took them) as a punishment, (and morning found them prostrate in their dwelling-place) and morning found them dead in their compound, without any movement.
